headline: Small furniture retailers face existential tariff threat, regardless of Supreme Court ruling
summary: As retailers await a decision from the Supreme Court on the future of tariffs, small furniture businesses will see little relief as upholstery duties remain.

raw.headline: Small furniture retailers face existential tariff threat, regardless of Supreme Court ruling
